AT.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
AT.description: Im aufregenden dritten Teil der Mega Man Zero-Reihe muss der Roboterheld ein weiteres Mal Neo Arcadia retten. Dieses Mal vor einem gigantischen Reploid namens Omega! Zum Glück verfügt Zero dafür über ein noch mächtigeres Arsenal an Waffen und Ausrüstung. Neue Anpassungschips ersetzen das altbekannte Form-System und du kannst diese Chips beliebig kombinieren, um dich jeder Situation anzupassen. Das Cyber-Elf-System wurde ebenfalls komplett überarbeitet. Außerdem wird Zeros neue Recoil Rod-Waffe dafür sorgen, dass seine Gegner ins Schwitzen kommen!

AU.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
AU.description: In the third exciting chapter of the Mega Man Zero series, the robotic hero must again come to the aid of Neo Arcadia; this time when danger looms in the shape of a new, giant Reploid: Omega! Fortunately, Zero's arsenal is now even more powerful. New customisation chips replace the previous Form system, allowing you to combine chips to adapt to any situation, and the Cyber Elf system has also been overhauled. Plus, Zero's new Recoil Rod weapon will make sure that enemies get the point!

BG.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
BG.description: In the third exciting chapter of the Mega Man Zero series, the robotic hero must again come to the aid of Neo Arcadia; this time when danger looms in the shape of a new, giant Reploid: Omega! Fortunately, Zero's arsenal is now even more powerful. New customisation chips replace the previous Form system, allowing you to combine chips to adapt to any situation, and the Cyber Elf system has also been overhauled. Plus, Zero's new Recoil Rod weapon will make sure that enemies get the point!

BE.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
BE.description: Dans ce troisième chapitre palpitant de la série Mega Man Zero, le héros-botique vient une fois de plus en aide à Neo Arcadia ; mais le danger se présente cette fois sous la forme d'un nouveau Réploïde géant : Omega ! Heureusement, l'arsenal de Zero est maintenant bien plus puissant. Les Cyber Elves ont été améliorés, et de nouvelles capsules à customiser remplacent désormais les anciennes, et vous permettent de les associer en fonction des situations. Sans oublier la nouvelle arme de Zero qui va donner une bonne leçon aux ennemis !

CH.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
CH.description: Im aufregenden dritten Teil der Mega Man Zero-Reihe muss der Roboterheld ein weiteres Mal Neo Arcadia retten. Dieses Mal vor einem gigantischen Reploid namens Omega! Zum Glück verfügt Zero dafür über ein noch mächtigeres Arsenal an Waffen und Ausrüstung. Neue Anpassungschips ersetzen das altbekannte Form-System und du kannst diese Chips beliebig kombinieren, um dich jeder Situation anzupassen. ES.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
ES.description: En la tercera emocionante aventura de la saga Mega Man Zero, nuestro robótico héroe acude en ayuda de Neo Arcadia, en esta ocasión para defenderla de la amenaza de un nuevo reploide gigante: Omega. Por suerte, el arsenal de Zero es más potente que nunca. Gracias al nuevo sistema de personalización de chips (que substituye al anterior sistema de formación) podrás combinar las fichas para adaptarte a cualquier situación. ¡Hasta los elfos cibernéticos han sufrido unos ajustes! ¡Sin duda, Zero y su nuevo arsenal se encargarán de que los enemigos aprendan la lección!

IT.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
IT.description: Nel terzo entusiasmante capitolo della saga di Mega Man Zero, il nostro robotico eroe torna alla riscossa di Neo Arcadia. Questa volta il pericolo incombe sotto forma di un nuovo, gigantesco Reploid, meglio conosciuto come Omega! Per sua fortuna, l'arsenale di Zero è ancora più micidiale: un inedito sistema di personalizzazione dei potenziamenti (che prende il posto delle tradizionali trasformazioni) ti permettere di adattare l'armatura alle tue esigenze di combattimento; anche gli elfi cibernetici sono più potenti! Inoltre, con la sua nuova catena, Zero darà ai suoi nemici una lezione memorabile!

LT.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3

NO.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
NO.description: In the third exciting chapter of the Mega Man Zero series, the robotic hero must again come to the aid of Neo Arcadia; this time when danger looms in the shape of a new, giant Reploid: Omega! Fortunately, Zero's arsenal is now even more powerful. New customisation chips replace the previous Form system, allowing you to combine chips to adapt to any situation, and the Cyber Elf system has also been overhauled. Plus, Zero's new Recoil Rod weapon will make sure that enemies get the point!

NL.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
NL.description: Dit derde deel in de spannende Mega Man Zero-reeks staat in het teken van Omega, een gigant van een Reploid die Neo Arcadia dreigt te vernietigen. Onze robotheld is wederom de enige die dit kan voorkomen. Gelukkig is het arsenaal van Zero flink krachtiger geworden. Een nieuwe methode om hem aan te passen naar gelang wens en situatie vervang het Form-systeem, en het Cyber Elf-systeem is ook verbeterd. Verder heeft Zero de beschikking over Recoil Rod, een nieuw wapen waar tegenstanders niet van terug hebben!

NZ.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
NZ.description: In the third exciting chapter of the Mega Man Zero series, the robotic hero must again come to the aid of Neo Arcadia; this time when danger looms in the shape of a new, giant Reploid: Omega! Fortunately, Zero's arsenal is now even more powerful. New customisation chips replace the previous Form system, allowing you to combine chips to adapt to any situation, and the Cyber Elf system has also been overhauled. Plus, Zero's new Recoil Rod weapon will make sure that enemies get the point!

PL.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
PL.description: In the third exciting chapter of the Mega Man Zero series, the robotic hero must again come to the aid of Neo Arcadia; this time when danger looms in the shape of a new, giant Reploid: Omega! Fortunately, Zero's arsenal is now even more powerful. New customisation chips replace the previous Form system, allowing you to combine chips to adapt to any situation, and the Cyber Elf system has also been overhauled. Plus, Zero's new Recoil Rod weapon will make sure that enemies get the point!

PT.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
PT.description: Nesta terceira e emocionante aventura da saga Mega Man Zero, o nosso herói robótico parte novamente em auxílio de Neo Arcadia, desta vez para a defender da ameaça de um novo e gigantesco Reploid: Omega! Por sorte, o arsenal de Zero está mais potente que nunca. Graças ao novo sistema de personalização de Chips (que substitui o sistema Form) poderás combinar Chips para adaptar-te a qualquer situação. Até o sistema Cyber Elf foi melhorado! E com Zero munido da sua nova arma Recoil Rod, os seus inimigos vão aprender a lição!

RU.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
RU.description: В третьей захватывающей части серии Mega Man Zero отважный кибергерой вновь приходит на помощь жителям города Neo Arcadia в борьбе с новым гигантским врагом — реплоидом Omega. К счастью, теперь Zero обладает более мощным арсеналом. Новая опция позволяет модернизировать экипировку героя и, в отличие от предыдущей системы форм, дает возможность комбинировать жетоны в зависимости от ситуации. Система маленьких могущественных существ Cyber Elf также была существенно изменена. В дополнение, у Zero появилось новое оружие ударно-дробящего действия Recoil Rod (цепь-рекошет), способное сразить любого противника наповал!

SE.name: Mega Man™ Zero 3
SE.description: In the third exciting chapter of the Mega Man Zero series, the robotic hero must again come to the aid of Neo Arcadia; this time when danger looms in the shape of a new, giant Reploid: Omega! Fortunately, Zero's arsenal is now even more powerful. New customisation chips replace the previous Form system, allowing you to combine chips to adapt to any situation, and the Cyber Elf system has also been overhauled. Plus, Zero's new Recoil Rod weapon will make sure that enemies get the point!
